org.apache.fineract.infrastructure.core.api

Class JsonQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.infrastructure.core.api.JsonQuery

  • public final class JsonQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Immutable representation of a query. Wraps the provided JSON with convenience functions for extracting parameter values.
